name: The Rage of Valhalla
description:
2D bit em up with cool stylized graphics will immerse you in a world of Chaos and allow you to pass through the mythical worlds of Scandinavian Mythology.
You have to prevent the hell that has engulfed Midgard and meet with a lot of Bosses from the depths of hell
THE GAME HAS:
-Flight Mode
-Very diverse bosses
-shooter elements
-Control of giants
-a diverse system of battles
-and much more
